channel.title: GoDaddy Help!
channel.description:
Hello! I need some serious help with GoDaddy. I have a VB license with Green Fox and Idk how to install it into forums because I cant find the SQL Database.
Also I am hiring a Web Designer. Contact my skype:zman2481

item.title: GoDaddy Help!
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

TheDiamondGamer:

Thats what im saying I dont know what im doing. I dont know how to code html or whatever. I need somebody to do for me. I might pay depending on how nice it looks.

On how nice it looks? It’s the default green fox vBulliten template…

Read full topic

item.title: GoDaddy Help!
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

What do you mean you can’t find an SQL database? Can you find the MySQL database section of the host? Have you created a database? Have you created a user for that database? Have you given that user the correct privileges? Have you set the password correct in the config.php file? There’s a whole lot more you have to tell us :P.

Read full topic
